name: Landing Zone
description:
Landing Zone

You must protect your love, she is locked in the basement and the key is in the doughnut. Protect the doughnut at all cost. She can not escape, she is yours and no one else can have her. 

Fight off the mad robots that are trying to free her, destroy them or keep them from the doughnut for the duration of the set for the waves.

WASD’s for movement
Left click: Fire weapon
Right click: Move inventory/Use Items
E: Pick-up items/Interact with doors
G: Through Fire grenade
H: Through Ice grenade
Tab: Inventory

 Credits: Syntheality
Walter Egel, Jason Clifford
